description: Learn how to make an easy creamy mushroom sauce to serve with steak or toss through pasta.
keywords: Sauce,Pescatarian,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Sesame free,Mushroom,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Creamy Mushroom Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp thyme leaves (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter into a frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook, stirring occasionally, for 4 minutes or until softened. Add garlic and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.

Add mushroom and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally or until tender. Add thyme and cook, stirring occasionally, for 2 minutes. Add vinegar and cook, stirring, for 1 minute. Add cream and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until cream has reduced by half.
Season and serve sprinkled with extra thyme.
